snippet: A United States diplomat has written to a French auction house on behalf of the Hopi Indians and requested that it postpone an auction of Hopi artifacts that is set to happen Friday.
abstract: A United States diplomat has written to a French auction house on behalf of the Hopi Indians and requested that it postpone an auction of Hopi artifacts that is set to happen Friday.

headline.main: U.S. Diplomat Asks Auction House to Delay Sale of Hopi Items
headline.print_headline: Embassy Discourages Sale of Hopi Ritual Items
